org.swisscheese.swisscheese.engine.rendering

Class Renderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.swisscheese.swisscheese.engine.rendering.Renderer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MultithreadedRendererDispatcher, SingleThreadedRenderer

    public abstract class Renderer
extends java.lang.Object
    An interface for rendering engines.
    Since:
    2019-01-05, v0.5
    Version:
    v1.0
    Author:
    Alex Kalinins

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Camera camera
      The Camera of the game
      private static RendererDetails details
      An object containing details about renderer.
      protected java.awt.Color FLOOR
      The color to which the floor (bottom half of screen) is colored
      protected static boolean psychadelic
      'Secret feature' for turning screen 'psychadelic'
      protected java.awt.Color SKY
      The color to which the sky (top half of screen) is colored
      protected static GammaState state
      Boolean for tracking if an image needs to be darkened
      protected View view
      A View object that is retrieved from camera.

      • Renderer

        protected Renderer(float width,
                   float height,
                   TexturePack texturePack,
                   Camera camera,
                   Map map)
        A constructor for the abstract class
        Parameters:
        width - the width of the screen
        height - the height of the screen
        texturePack - the List of WallTexture objects containing wall textures.
        camera - the Camera of the game.
        map - the map in which the player is.

      • Renderer

        protected Renderer(RendererDetails details,
                   Camera camera)
        A constructor for creating a renderer from existing RendererDetails
        Parameters:
        details - the details which contain all parameters
        camera - camera from which the person is seeing

    • Method Detail

      • render

        public int[] render(int[] pixels)
        Renders the pixels array. THIS CLASS MUST BE OVERRIDED, SEE CLASS ANNOTATION...
        Parameters:
        pixels - array of RGB values being rendered
        Returns:
        a rendered pixel array.

      • isMultithreaded

        public abstract boolean isMultithreaded()
        Returns:
        true if the renderer is able to utilize multiple threads.

      • getGammaState

        public static GammaState getGammaState()
        Returns:
        the GammaState of the image (dark, bright, normal)

      • setGammaState

        public static void setGammaState(GammaState state)
        Makes the image either normal, bright, or dim.
        Parameters:
        state - the state to set

      • getMover

        public final Mover getMover()
        Updates and gets Mover.
        Returns:
        a Mover from Camera.

      • fillBackground

        protected final int[] fillBackground(int[] pixels)
        Fills the background (with SKY and FLOOR color). Also clears pixels.
        Parameters:
        pixels - pixels array
        Returns:
        pixels with filled background.

      • getDetails

        public static RendererDetails getDetails()
        Getter for renderer details
        Returns:

      • makePsychadelic

        public static void makePsychadelic()
        Toggles renderer to become psychadelic (by not clearing background)

      • changeTextures

        public final void changeTextures(TexturePack pack)
        Changes the TexturePack of the RendererDetails used by Renderer.
        Parameters:
        pack - the texture pack that is being used.
